name: Far Down
description:
Far Down

You are a diver trying to reach as far below this endless deep sea trench. The only weapon you have uses air but unfortunately you also need that air to stay alive. The depths are teeming with aggressive creatures so you will have to avoid anything you can and only use your air to dispatch creatures that block your way. 

You may also find previous divers who were less successful and if you have enough air you can collect theirs.

Each level and the enemies are procedurally generated so things made get crazy.

We unfortunately didn't end up with an audio or music (I dropped the ball on that with not giving myself enough time)

Peteychan - Programming and Art

StinkoSupreme- Additional Art
